N20051119-0010, Windows XP 
 
There were 2 failures in the dynamic plug-ins test suite.  The failures only 
occurred on Windows XP.

I think was has been recorded in the bugs 114527, 114405, 114813. The fixes 
are supplied in those bugs.
Oleg: Why does the failure only happen on Windows XP?  Is this timing related?

Yes, those seem to be related to timing issues (a race condition and an 
incorrect synchronization).
The three referenced bugs have been resolved.  This should no longer be an issue.
